description.@value: Salted Mocha Hot Chocolate is a delicious chocolaty drink perfect to serve on a chilly day. Espresso adds nice mocha flavor to this beverage.

recipeIngredient.@value: 1½ oz Forte Espresso in White Chocolate
1½ oz Forte Sea Salt in Milk Chocolate

recipeInstructions.@value: In a heavy bottom saucepan, bring the milk to almost boiling. As soon as the bubbles start to form around the edge of the pan remove from the heat.
Pour the hot chocolate into four mugs. Top each with a swirl or spoonful of whipped cream. Serve immediately.
Add the chocolate, coffee powder and stir until all the chocolate has melted and the mixture is smooth.
